class.name: OpenXRAndroidTrackableTracker
class.description:
Base class for trackable types.
[b]NOTE:[/b] Calling any getter function here or in deriving classes will always ensure the latest state.

method.name: get_center_pose
method.description: Return the latest [Transform3D] from the XR runtime. This may not equal this node's [member Node3D.global_transform] if it's called before [OpenXRAndroidTrackablesExtension]'s process.

method.name: get_tracking_state
method.description: Returns the current [enum TrackingState] of this tracker.

signal.name: updated
signal.description: Signal emitted when the XR runtime determines that this tracker's pose, state, etc, was updated.

constants.constant: Indicates that the tracker is paused but may be resumed in the future.
Tracking has stopped for this tracker and will never be resumed.
This tracker's pose is being updated and is current.
The tracker state is none of the other states, usually due to an error.
